feed.title: Purdue ARC
feed.subtitle: The official website of Purdue University's Autonomous Robotics Club

entry.title: IARC
entry.content: Purdue ARC spend three years designing and testing a large autonomous multi-rotor to herd randomly moving roomba robots towards a designated goal area. This comptition is no longer active.
entry.summary: Purdue ARC spend three years designing and testing a large autonomous multi-rotor to herd randomly moving roomba robots towards a designated goal area. This comptition is no longer active.

entry.title: Autonomous RC Car
entry.content:
ARC is now developings it's own hardware and software to control a small autonomous vehicle. We started with an off the shelf RC car and replaced nearly all the electronics in order to create our platform.

The goal of this project is to build a vehicle capable of autonomously exploring and mapping complex environments. In the future, we may use this platform in other challenges or competitions.
entry.summary:
ARC is now developings it's own hardware and software to control a small autonomous vehicle. We started with an off the shelf RC car and replaced nearly all the electronics in order to create our platform.
The goal of this project is to build a vehicle capable of autonomously exploring and mapping complex environments. In the future, we may use this platform in other challenges or competitions.
